Disclosure Requirement E3-4 – Water consumption
26. The undertaking shall disclose information on its water consumption performance related
to its material impacts, risks and opportunities.
27. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to provide an understanding of the undertaking’s
water consumption and any progress by the undertaking in relation to its targets.
28. The disclosure required by paragraph 26 relates to own operations and shall include:
